subject: Re: ShellShocked page to add
preview: Hi Shelly, Thanks, all clear now! Tested and working fine at our end. Please confirm the same at your end.

full_threads.body:
Hi Shelly, 

Thanks, all clear now! Tested and working fine at our end. Please confirm the same at your end.

It's up and looks great Chris.

But I can't open the page on my mobile. It's saying "too many redirects"

Can you please confirm it's working for mobile?

Shelly

Shelly Horton

0404 868 463

https://shellshockedmedia.com/

Hi Shelly, 

Confirming the new page has been added to both desktop and mobile menus. 

If you don't see the changes immediately, it's just the caching and it will resolve in a few moments.

Thank you.

That position is perfect.

Shelly

Shelly Horton

0404 868 463

https://shellshockedmedia.com/

Hi Shelly, 

Thanks, we have resolved the "what to expect" duplicate. Also noting the adjustment is not being tracked for time. 

Can you please confirm the position of where you would like it sit? E.g. Under courses to sit below "who is this for?". 

Also confirming the spacing around "limited to five places.." has been adjusted. The mobile view has also been cleaned up. 

We're standing by to make the page live.

Hi Chris,

This course needs to go live under courses.

However...

In this version of the page there is a complete copy of "What to expect" making it incorrect from the last version. It should be "What to expect" and "Who should attend"

Please fix it. And please subtract that version's time from our bill as that is not something I requested.

Your dev team also has not looked at the layout of the page like you said they would and reduced the space between the introduction and "Limited to five places the session is inclusive and supportive. Learn in a safe space with other people with similar goals."

I really need it to go live as soon as possible.

Shelly x

Shelly Horton

0404 868 463

https://shellshockedmedia.com/

Push it live thanks.

We'll work the rest out later

Shelly Horton

0404 868 463

https://shellshockedmedia.com/

Ticket total time tracked so far is 4 hours and 15 minutes. Harvest is and tag is accurate at 14/02/24.

+15 mins from Joel.

Hi Shelly, 

Thanks, confirming the most recent round of updates has been completed: https://shellshockedmedia.com/speak-with-impact-workshop/

The first "buy now" button is called an anchor link and is intended to take the visitor down to the payment options to choose the most appropriate option. 

We can automate the payment,  and the developer team recommend the use of the following paid subscription plugin: https://woo.com/products/woocommerce-subscriptions/. Please let us know if you would to go ahead with this option. 

And finally, yes, we can indeed make the page live. Please let us know where you would like it positioned in the menu and we'll make it happen. 

I also wanted to provide a quick update on your support hours. For the month of February, we have used an additional 2 hours and 15 minutes on top of the included 2 hours/month of support.

One more thing.

Please replace the second column under the photo with this...

Led by TV presenter and journalist Shelly Horton, this workshop includes practical exercises, tips and tricks. Using her experience as a journalist she will help you polish your messages and ensure they are on brand for you or your business. If you have an upcoming speech or client presentation, you can use the session to work on your performance and delivery.You will have some on-camera time and feedback with copies of videos to review and/or publish.

Shelly Horton

0404 868 463

https://shellshockedmedia.com/

The page looks great.

Is there a way to automate the payment plans?

Couple of things

The Let's Do This buy now at the header doesn't go to the cart.

Under payment options - Can you put (2 x $1125.00) and (3 x $800) in the payment options as it looks like you only pay once

Let's get the page live and work it out later

Thanks

Shelly

Shelly Horton

0404 868 463

https://shellshockedmedia.com/
+ 1 hour 15 minutes.

Hi Shelly, 

Here is the page with the payment options integrated: https://shellshockedmedia.com/speak-with-impact-workshop/

Please note that once an attendee processes their initial payment, payments 2 and 3 will need to be manually processed according to their chosen payment plan.

Hi @joel, all looking great on desktop. 

There are some elements on mobile that are a little cramped with padding/margins. Can you please take a quick look at it?

@chris All good now on this one.

https://shellshockedmedia.com/speak-with-impact-workshop/#buynow

+60mins Thanks!

hi @joel, client has approved the content and layout on: https://shellshockedmedia.com/?page_id=4354&preview=true

Can I please have your assistance with:
1. adjust spacing and padding on "orange BG box" section + add it to mobile view
2. Add stripe payment function using the existing payment gateway + Gravity forms, copy and paste from the client below. 
--//-- 
Price is $1950 +GST and needs to be payable through our Stripe account on that page.

I'd like to also offer a payment plan

2 part payments $1125 +GST <> per payment (total $2250)
3 part payments $800 +GST per payment (total $2400)
--//-- 
+15 mins.

Hi Shelly, 

Great, thanks. 

I have this queued with the dev team and will provide an update ASAP.

Excellent.

Thanks

Can you please remove "Taming the nerves" in - What to expect - to even up the columns.

In the header please centre the date.

But otherwise I'm happy to approve and get your guys to finesse and add the Stripe payments.

Please note these sessions are limited to 5 people per workshop so I can't have unlimited purchases.

Shelly x

Shelly Horton

0404 868 463

https://shellshockedmedia.com/

Hi Shelly, 

Thanks. 

Confirming the following changes have been made:
1. What to expect and Who should attend are now in 2 columns
2. MArch typo corrected
3. Sentence under photo balanced between 2 columns

I'll get the devs to run over the page to tighten up the spacing and polish to the mobile view once you are happy with the content.

Hey Chris

Just changed it into two longer columns. Hope that will look better.

Also the MArch issue is at the very top of the page not under the photo.

Plus can we space out the sentence under the photo so the columns are even and reduce the space between the final line in bold so there is not such a gap.

Would it be easier to jump on a call?

Shelly Horton

0404 868 463

https://shellshockedmedia.com/

@rica FYI

Additional +30 mins added to harvest on original entry, tag updated.

I'll have a look now

Shelly Horton

0404 868 463

https://shellshockedmedia.com/

Hi Shelly, 

Thanks, the updates have been completed. 

For the update: "change to 3 columns" the content length for each box is causing some balance issues. Please let me know if you'd like to change the content length. Once finalised, we will work to balance the page using code.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Chris Paradowski
